components.html: Note: For the purpose of this section, an auditor engaged by a Licensed Corporation to prepare an auditor's report to be submitted by a Licensed Corporation under Section 156 of the SFO is not considered to be performing an internal audit function.
components.label: Content

components.html: 1 Does the Licensed Corporation have any internal audit functionNote? [BQ17019]
components.label: Content

components.html: Note: A function, whether provided by internal staff or third party, responsible for reviewing the adherence to, and the adequacy and effectiveness of, the Licensed Corporation's internal control.
components.label: Content

components.html:
2 Please indicate the unit(s) which is/ are responsible for carrying out the internal audit functions for the Licensed Corporation.
(Please choose all options that are applicable to the Licensed Corporation.) [BQ17020]
components.label: Content
(a) Internal Audit department of the Licensed Corporation

components.html: (i) If (a) is chosen, please specify the number of staff in the department: [BQ17020_01_01]
components.label: Content
(b) Other department(s) of the Licensed Corporation

components.html: (i) Please specify the name of the department: [BQ17020_02_01]
components.label: Content

components.html: (ii) Please specify the number of staff in the department who is responsible for performing the internal audit function: [BQ17020_02_02]
components.label: Content
(c) Internal Audit department of a group or affiliated company

components.html: (i) If (c) is chosen, please specify the name of the group or affiliated company: [BQ17020_03_01]
components.label: Content

components.html: (i) If (d) is chosen, please specify the name(s) of the third party(ies): [BQ17020_04_01]
components.label: Content

components.html:
3 Please indicate the frequency that internal audit is carried out.
(Please choose all options that are applicable to the Licensed Corporation.) [BQ17021_01]
components.label: Content

values.label: At least biennially (ie, at least once every two years)

components.html: 4 (a) Were any business and/ or supporting functions of the Licensed Corporation subject to review by internal audit during the financial year? [BQ17022_01]
components.label: Content

components.html:
4 (b) If the answer is "Yes" in (a), please indicate which of the following business and/ or supporting function(s) was/ were reviewed.
(Please choose all options that are applicable to the Licensed Corporation.) [BQ17022_02]
components.label: Content
(iii) Provision of investment research or analysis
(iv) Wealth management and/ or asset management
(x) Providing depositary services for relevant CISs

components.html: 4 (c) If the answer is "Yes" in (a), were there any material issues identified during the internal audit? [BQ17022_03]
components.label: Content

components.html: 4 (d) If the answer is "Yes" in (c), please state the issue(s). [BQ17022_04]
components.label: Content
